configuration.name: qemu32-pmp-debug
configuration.PROGRAM_PARAMS: -nodefaults -nographic -serial mon:stdio -machine virt,rpmi=true -accel tcg -bios build/dbg/opensbi32/platform/generic/firmware/fw_jump.bin -cpu max -m 1536M -kernel build/dbg/linux32/arch/riscv/boot/Image -append "earlycon console=ttyS0" -gdb tcp::9822 -S
